title: Eça (João Fogaça de)
body: Under the Spanish yoke, João Fogaça de Eça was the general governor of Madeira, whose appointment dates back to August 14, 1603.

João Fogaça de Eça: General governor of Madeira under the Spanish yoke, appointed on August 14, 1603.

1603: Appointment of João Fogaça de Eça as general governor of Madeira.
